Yeah, these things have a way of getting out of control. The signature  
on=
 the tsuba is the same as the Nagatoshi listed first in the Kinko  
Jiten, =
and as I have fuchi-kashira by this artisan, the signature is  
very differ=
ent, and the level of workmanship leaves that tsuba in the  
dust...

Gordo=
n
